sentences.en: a titanic struggle between good and evil
sentences.cn: 善与恶之间的一场大搏斗

sentences.en: According to local folklore it is an evil place.
sentences.cn: 据当地民间传说，那是个不祥的地方。

sentences.en: an evil dictator responsible for the deaths of millions
sentences.cn: 应对数百万人之死负责的邪恶独裁者

sentences.en: Apartheid is even a greater evil.
sentences.cn: 种族隔离是更大的祸害。

sentences.en: Both men were smoking evil-smelling pipes.
sentences.cn: 两个男人都在抽着难闻的烟斗。

sentences.en: Good and evil may co-exist within one family.
sentences.cn: 善与恶可能并存于一体。

sentences.en: he &B{gave} me &B{the evil eye} as I walked down the corridor.
sentences.cn: 我经过走廊时他恶毒地看了我一眼。

sentences.en: He looked at her with an evil leer.
sentences.cn: 他用不怀好意的目光看着她。

sentences.en: He was not evil, but he was sick.
sentences.cn: 他人并不坏，但精神有问题。

sentences.en: Higher taxes may be a necessary evil.
sentences.cn: 提高税收可能会很不受欢迎，但却是必要的。

sentences.en: his evil deeds
sentences.cn: 他的恶行

sentences.en: it is a sin to speak evil of the king.
sentences.cn: 诽谤国王是一种罪过。

sentences.en: Poverty is one of the greatest social evils of our time.
sentences.cn: 贫困是当代最大的社会弊端之一。

sentences.en: She wanted to protect her children from the evils of the outside world.
sentences.cn: 她想保护她的孩子不受外界的不良影响。

sentences.en: the evil effects of racism
sentences.cn: 种族主义的恶劣影响

sentences.en: the evils of capitalism
sentences.cn: 资本主义的种种祸害

sentences.en: The perpetrators of this evil deed must be brought to justice.
sentences.cn: 必须将参与这一恶行的凶手绳之以法。

sentences.en: The use of light and dark symbolizes good and evil.
sentences.cn: 用光明与黑暗来象征善与恶。

sentences.en: There is too much evil in the world.
sentences.cn: 世上的罪恶太多。

sentences.en: There's always a conflict between good and evil in his plays.
sentences.cn: 他的戏剧中总是有善恶之间的斗争。

sentences.en: These are evil-minded people.
sentences.cn: 这是一些心理阴暗的人。

sentences.en: When we go out, girls are always giving me the evil eye.
sentences.cn: 我们出去时，女孩子们总是用忌妒的眼神看着我。

sentences.en: With knowledge and wisdom, evil could be vanquished on this earth.
sentences.cn: 拥有了知识和智慧就能够把恶势力从这个世界上铲除。

phrases.tran_cn: 作恶；为非作歹；干坏事；造孽
n. 有些人具有目视他人而使之遭殃的能力；恶毒眼光
尽量拖延不做令人不快的事
生化危机（原为日本恐怖游戏，后改编为电影）
n. 对社会大众有害的事物；社会恶习
恶毒眼光（按照迷信的观点，这样的眼光会使人遭受实质性的伤害）

trans.tran_cn: 邪恶的，有害的，令人作呕的
trans.tran_en: someone who is evil deliberately does very cruel things to harm other people
something that is very bad or harmful
